daos

Class FriendRequestDAO

  • java.lang.Object
    • daos.DAO
      • daos.FriendRequestDAO

  • public class FriendRequestDAO
extends DAO
    DAO class that manages FriendRequest Note that in most cases, order of FriendRequest.caller and FriendRequest.receiver doesn't matter

        public FriendRequest insertOne(FriendRequest fr)
                        throws DuplicateDataException
        Inserts a friend request in the database
        Parameters:
        fr - the friend request to insert
        Returns:
        the just inserted FriendRequest
        Throws:
        DuplicateDataException - if the friend request already exists

      • findOneByPseudos

        public FriendRequest findOneByPseudos(java.lang.String pseudo1,
                                      java.lang.String pseudo2)
                               throws NotFoundException
        Searches for a FriendRequest in the database
        Parameters:
        pseudo1 - the User that created or received the FriendRequest
        pseudo2 - the User that created or received the FriendRequest
        Returns:
        the FriendRequest related to the two users
        Throws:
        NotFoundException - if the FriendRequest is not found in the database
